an array of integer represent different damage of SnippingAction after different number of consecutive aiming corresponding to the value of index

A class that represents bare dirt.

distance(Location, Location) - Method in class game.FollowBehaviour
Compute the Manhattan distance between two locations.
doubleMissChance() - Method in class game.ZombieIntrinsicWeapon
Double the chances for Zombie to miss the attack when using this intrinsic weapon
DROP_LIMB_CHANCE - Static variable in class game.Zombie
A constant integer which represents the probability of zombie dropping one of its limbs from an attack, by default is 25
DROP_WEAPON_CHANCE - Static variable in class game.Zombie
A constant integer which represents the probability of zombie dropping one of its weapons when dropping one of its arms, by default is 50
dropAllWeapon(Actor, GameMap) - Method in class game.Zombie
Drop all of the weapons in the zombie's inventory to the location of the attacking actor, if there is any.
dropArm(Actor, GameMap) - Method in class game.Zombie
Perform operations when one Zombie's arm is knocked off.
dropCorpseItems(GameMap) - Method in class game.AttackAction
When the target dies, all the items in the target's inventory will be dropped to the ground.
dropFirstWeapon(Actor, GameMap) - Method in class game.Zombie
Drop the first weapon in the zombie's inventory to the location of the attacking actor, if there is any.
dropLeg(Actor, GameMap) - Method in class game.Zombie
Perform operations when one Zombie's leg is knocked off.
dropLimb(Actor, GameMap) - Method in class game.Zombie
Randomly choose to drop one of the zombie's limbs if there is still any, else return without doing anything.
dropWeapon(Actor, GameMap) - Method in class game.Zombie
Return an Actions consisting of all the dropping actions of weapons in the actor's inventory
